mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT(town)) from v_gxsw_payinfo where year = #{year}

select town,sum(payment_amount) as allmoney ,count(*) as allpeople from v_gxsw_payinfo where year = #{year} GROUP BY town
limit #{startNumber},#{pageSize}

SELECT temp_thisyear.town,allmoney,lastyearallmoney,allpeople,lastyearallpeople FROM( SELECT town, SUM(payment_amount) allmoney, COUNT(*) allpeople FROM v_gxsw_payinfo WHERE `year` = #{year} GROUP BY town ) temp_thisyear LEFT JOIN ( SELECT town, SUM(payment_amount) lastyearallmoney, COUNT(*) lastyearallpeople FROM v_gxsw_payinfo WHERE `year` = (#{year}-1) GROUP BY town ) temp_lastyear on temp_thisyear.town=temp_lastyear.town
limit #{startNumber},#{pageSize}
select count(DISTINCT(village)) from v_gxsw_payinfo where town = #{town} and year = #{year}

select temp_thisyear.village,allmoney,lastyearallmoney,allpeople,lastyearallpeople from (select village,sum(payment_amount) as allmoney ,count(*) as allpeople from v_gxsw_payinfo where town = #{town} and year = #{year} GROUP BY village) temp_thisyear LEFT JOIN (select village,sum(payment_amount) as lastyearallmoney ,count(*) as lastyearallpeople from v_gxsw_payinfo where town = #{town} and year = #{year}-1 GROUP BY village) temp_lastyear on temp_thisyear.village = temp_lastyear.village
limit #{startNumber},#{pageSize}
SELECT DISTINCT town FROM v_gxsw_payinfo WHERE year = (#{year}-1) AND credit_code NOT IN ( SELECT credit_code FROM v_gxsw_payinfo WHERE year = #{year} )

SELECT credit_code, taxpayer_name, specific_item, town, village FROM v_gxsw_payinfo WHERE year = (#{year}-1) AND credit_code NOT IN ( SELECT credit_code FROM v_gxsw_payinfo WHERE year = #{year} ) AND town = #{town} ORDER BY village
